text: 5.5: Ro 8.16; 8.23; 2 Ko 1.22; Ef 1.14; 2.10Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara mba zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki kɨrɨ tɨva ndir zav nza bevahegi. Ana nduara won Ŋina Ŋaarar nza nɨɨŋgi. Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar, ana Fhe Bakɨme mba nzan nɨɨn zav mbui bigir vhuuin pana kharav fharigi bigɨnan vhuuŋ ma. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ndigi, nza kaŋgi, nza guigi guarara mba harigi bigi, nza vhɨra nta ndigirga.
